name: Message in a Bottle
instructions: Combine all in a shaker with cubed ice.
Shake and strain into a snifter over crushed ice.
Serve with bamboo straws and garnish with a banana leaf, pineapple spear, or kaffir lime leaf.

For Kaffir Lime Leaf–Infused Rum: Combine 1 fresh kaffir lime leaf and 12 1/2 ounces (375 milliliters) aged white rum in a glass or nonporous, nonreactive container. Let steep at room temperature for 2 hours. Drain and discard leaf before use. Decant into a clean bottle and store refrigerated indefinitely.
